ygData.subject: Re: Level 20 Combat Strategies
ygData.msgSnippet: ... besides root and nuke.  Enstill and Titan Clash come to mind, DD ... DD gets resisted A LOT, possibly because of its dual effects, Actually, what I ve
ygData.messageBody:
>I have just made level 20 and have noticed that I now get several options
besides root and nuke. Enstill and Titan Clash come to mind, DD
>spell does some stunning, plus I still got my old Root and Nukes. The new
DD gets resisted A LOT, possibly because of its dual effects,

Actually, what I've noticed is that all new spells fizzle, and get resisted
a lot. Haven't made 20th just yet, but this happened with 12th shock of
lightning, and 16th flame shock and lightning bolt. I think it's more of a
'I just got a new spell, not how does it work' thing. I was in Permafrost
with Azymodin a 21st high elf wizard, and he was casting force shocks left
right and centre with no resisted and lots of dead goblins.

Which brings up another point. Has anyone ever noticed that once you hit
that last bubble before next experience your spells fizzle, don't do as much
damage, things break root all the time, annoying, but I'd like to know if
it's just me or a general thing.

Something else more in keeping with this mailing list.

1. Where do I find runes? I haven't found any at all. I think I asked this
before but no one answered it. I'm dying to start researching, but my old
erudin is below average only.

2. How the heck do I make money ?

Zalbar
18th Wizard
Solusek Ro
